channel.title: Stockwatch - Key Events
channel.description: Real-time corporate announcements, deals, and financial results.

item.title: [LALPATHLAB] Dr. Lal PathLabs launches SOVAAKA - a next-generation wellness centre blending science, technology, and personalized care
item.description:
ðŸ”¥ Trending

Dr. Lal PathLabs Limited, a trusted diagnostics brand in India, has announced the launch of SOVAAKA, a new-age Diagnostic Experience Centre in Gurugram. The centre, built on the philosophy of â€˜Science Behind Wellness,â€™ introduces a new standard in preventive and lifestyle healthcare. SOVAAKA offers a deeply personalised diagnostics-led wellness experience, with doctor-designed programs for women and men. It brings together advanced diagnostics, cutting-edge technology, and medical expertise to help individuals take proactive control of their health. The centre ensures fast turnaround, comprehensive insights, and a deeply personalised evaluation experience.

  • Dr. Lal PathLabs launches SOVAAKA, a next-generation wellness centre in Gurugram.
  • SOVAAKA offers personalised diagnostics-led wellness experience with doctor-designed programs for women and men.
  • The centre combines precision diagnostics, cutting-edge technology, and medical expertise for proactive health management.
  • SOVAAKA provides advanced diagnostics, including low-dose CT, 1.5T MRI, DEXA scanning, genetic analysis, and a wide menu of routine and advanced blood tests.
  • The launch is a significant step forward in strengthening preventive care in India.

item.title: [LUCENT] Mobavenue AI Tech Ltd Makes Significant Progress in 2025: Incorporates UK Subsidiary, Acquires Mobavenue Media, Changes Name, Launches AI-Powered Product, and Raises Capital
item.description:
ðŸ”¥ Trending

Mobavenue AI Tech Ltd, formerly known as Lucent Industries Limited, has made substantial progress in its business operations in 2025. The company has incorporated a wholly owned subsidiary in the United Kingdom, completed the acquisition of Mobavenue Media Private Limited, changed its name to reflect its focus on AI-led technology platforms, launched an AI-powered search and contextual advertising platform called OrbitX, and was recognized with the â€˜2025 Champions of Scaleâ€™ Award by Aerospike. Furthermore, the company has appointed a Strategic Advisor, raised capital through a preferential issue, and introduced an Employee Stock Option Scheme (ESOP) to attract, retain, and motivate key employees. The company's outlook for FY 2026 remains focused on building a technology-first, AI-led ecosystem for advertising, marketing, and consumer growth.

  • Incorporated a wholly owned subsidiary in the UK
  • Acquired Mobavenue Media Private Limited
  • Changed company name to Mobavenue AI Tech Ltd
  • Launched AI-powered search and contextual advertising platform OrbitX
  • Raised capital through preferential issue for growth initiatives

ðŸ“„ Read Official Filing (PDF)


Company: Lucent Industries Ltd | Category: Business Update

item.title: [JONJUA] Jonjua Air Limited Disposes Portion of Holding in Jonjua Overseas Limited
item.description:
Jonjua Air Limited, a Promoter Group of Jonjua Overseas Limited, has sold a portion of its holding in Jonjua Overseas Limited on 05/01/2026. The disclosure for the same has been attached and submitted in compliance with Regulation 29 (2) of SEBI (SAST) Regulations, 2011 and other applicable rules and regulations. The sale details include 40,63,222 shares, reducing their holding from 63.222% to 12.16% of the total share/voting capital.

  • Jonjua Air Limited, a Promoter Group of Jonjua Overseas Limited, has sold a portion of its holding in Jonjua Overseas Limited.
  • The sale includes 40,63,222 shares, reducing their holding from 63.222% to 12.16% of the total share/voting capital.
  • The disclosure has been submitted in compliance with Regulation 29 (2) of SEBI (SAST) Regulations, 2011 and other applicable rules and regulations.
  • The sale occurred on 05/01/2026.
  • Jonjua Air Limited remains a Promoter Group of Jonjua Overseas Limited post-sale.

ðŸ“„ Read Official Filing (PDF)


Company: Jonjua Overseas Ltd | Category: Sale of Property

item.title: [LICI] Life Insurance Corporation of India Launches New Savings Plan 'Jeevan Utsav'
item.description:
ðŸ”¥ Trending

The Life Insurance Corporation of India has announced the launch of a new product, 'Jeevan Utsav'. This Non-Par, Non-Linked, Individual, Single Premium Savings, Whole Life Insurance Plan will be available for sale in the domestic market from January 12, 2026. The announcement was made in accordance with the Listing Regulations, 2015.

  • Life Insurance Corporation of India launches a new product called 'Jeevan Utsav'
  • The product is a Non-Par, Non-Linked, Individual, Single Premium Savings, Whole Life Insurance Plan
  • The product is intended for the domestic market
  • The product will be available for sale from January 12, 2026
  • The announcement is made in accordance with the Listing Regulations, 2015

Company: Life Insurance Corporation of India | Category: New Launch

item.title: [SANCF] Sanchay Finvest Ltd. Proposes Preferential Issue of 48,50,000 Equity Shares at Rs. 10/- Each
item.description:

The company proposed to increase its authorized capital from Rs. 8,00,00,000 to Rs. 12,00,00,000/- to accommodate the fresh issue of proposed preferential allotment. 2.   • Issuance of up to 48,50,000 Equity Shares at a price of Rs. 10/- per equity share

item.title: [SANCF] Sanchay Finvest Ltd. Proposes Capital Increase and Preferential Allotment of Equity Shares
item.description:
Sanchay Finvest Ltd. announced that its Board of Directors held a meeting on January 5, 2026, and approved several key matters. The Board proposed to increase the authorized capital of the company from Rs. 8,00,00,000 to Rs. 12,00,00,000, subject to necessary approvals in the ensuing EGM. Additionally, the Board approved the issuance of up to 48,50,000 equity shares at a price of Rs. 10/- per equity share on a preferential basis to selected allottees. The company has taken valuation and regulatory compliance measures to ensure a smooth process. The preferential issue is subject to the approval of the members of the company and relevant regulatory/statutory authorities.

  • Proposed increase in authorized capital from Rs. 8,00,00,000 to Rs. 12,00,00,000
  • Issuance of up to 48,50,000 equity shares at a price of Rs. 10/- per equity share on a preferential basis
  • Valuation Report from CA. Jay Ashok Shah, IBBI Registered ' Valuer' and Regulation 163(2) certificate from Mr. Ramesh Chandra Mishra
  • Change of registered office from State of Madhya Pradesh to State of Maharashtra
  • Extraordinary General Meeting scheduled for 5% February, 2026

ðŸ“„ Read Official Filing (PDF)


Company: SANCHAY FINVEST LTD. | Category: Investment

item.title: [SANCF] Sanchay Finvest Ltd. Proposes Capital Increase and Preferential Allotment of Equity Shares
item.description:
Sanchay Finvest Ltd. held a Board Meeting on 5th January, 2026, where they proposed to increase the authorized capital of the company from Rs. 8,00,00,000 to Rs. 12,00,00,000/- after seeking necessary approvals in an ensuing EGM. The company also proposed to accommodate the fresh issue of proposed preferential allotment of 48,50,000 equity shares. The proposed allottees include SATRA Promoter, Non-SATRA Promoter, and Non-Promoter. The issue price per share is decided at Rs. 10/- per share. The company has fixed 6th January, 2026 as the Relevant Date for the Preferential Issue and decided to provide e-voting facility to the shareholders of the Company for the ensuing Extraordinary General Meeting through CSDL platform.

  • Proposed increase in authorized capital from Rs. 8,00,00,000 to Rs. 12,00,00,000/-
  • Preferential allotment of 48,50,000 equity shares
  • Issue price per share is Rs. 10/-
  • Fixed Relevant Date for the Preferential Issue as 6th January, 2026
  • Decision to provide e-voting facility for the ensuing Extraordinary General Meeting

ðŸ“„ Read Official Filing (PDF)


Company: SANCHAY FINVEST LTD. | Category: Investment

item.title: [HAPPSTMNDS] Happiest Minds Technologies Clarifies Clerical Error in Gavs Technologies Acquisition
item.description:
Happiest Minds Technologies Ltd. has issued a corrigendum to clarify an inadvertent error in their earlier intimation regarding the acquisition of Gavs Technologies Limited. The company confirmed that it has not acquired Gavs Technologies Limited. Instead, it executed a Share Purchase Agreement with Gavs Technologies Limited to acquire 100% business interest of their Middle East business, including InnovazIT Technologies LLC, Dubai; Gavs Technologies LLC, Oman; and Gavs Technologies Saudi Arabia for Telecommunications and Information Technology, Saudi Arabia. The integration process of these acquired companies has been completed as of January 05, 2026. The company clarified that this error was unintentional and not deliberate, requesting stakeholders to accept the corrigendum and update their records accordingly.

  • Happiest Minds Technologies clarified a clerical error in their earlier intimation about acquiring Gavs Technologies Limited.
  • The company has not acquired Gavs Technologies Limited but executed a Share Purchase Agreement to acquire 100% business interest of their Middle East business.
  • The acquired Middle East businesses include InnovazIT Technologies LLC, Dubai; Gavs Technologies LLC, Oman; and Gavs Technologies Saudi Arabia for Telecommunications and Information Technology, Saudi Arabia.
  • The integration process of the acquired companies has been completed as of January 05, 2026.
  • The company ensured stakeholders that the error was unintentional and not deliberate.

ðŸ“„ Read Official Filing (PDF)


Company: Happiest Minds Technologies Ltd | Category: Acquisitions

item.title: [SANCF] Sanchay Finvest Ltd. Proposes Capital Increase for Preferential Allotment of Equity Shares
item.description:
Sanchay Finvest Ltd. announced a Board Meeting on Monday, 5% January, 2026, where they proposed to increase the authorized capital of the company from Rs. 8,00,00,000 to Rs. 12,00,00,000/- after seeking necessary approvals in an ensuing EGM. The company plans to accommodate a fresh issue of proposed preferential allotment of 48,50,000 equity shares. The proposed allottees include SATRA Promoter, VRUTIKA PRAFUL, ANIL BABUBHAI, and SAUMYA SINGH. The issue price per share is decided at Rs. 10/- each, with a total amount of up to Rs. 4,85,00,000. The company has also appointed Mr. Ramesh Chandra Mishra as a Scrutinizer for the ensuing EGM.

  • Proposed increase in authorized capital from Rs. 8,00,00,000 to Rs. 12,00,00,000/-
  • Preferential allotment of 48,50,000 equity shares
  • Issue price per share set at Rs. 10/-
  • Total amount for the preferential issue is up to Rs. 4,85,00,000
  • Appointment of Mr. Ramesh Chandra Mishra as a Scrutinizer for the ensuing EGM

ðŸ“„ Read Official Filing (PDF)


Company: SANCHAY FINVEST LTD. | Category: Investment

item.title: [SANCF] Sanchay Finvest Ltd. Proposes Capital Increase and Preferential Allotment of Equity Shares
item.description:
Sanchay Finvest Ltd. held a Board Meeting on Monday, 5% January, 2026, where they proposed to increase the authorized capital of the company from Rs. 8,00,00,000 to Rs. 12,00,00,000/-. They also approved the issuance of up to 48,50,000 Equity Shares at a price of Rs. 10/- each to proposed allottees on a preferential basis.
